name: items
description: A list of items to display as quick filters.

params.name: label
params.description: The text label for the quick filter.

params.name: href
params.description: The URL of the quick filter item.

params.name: title
params.description: An optional title attribute for the quick filter.

params.name: selected
params.description: If `true`, highlight the quick filter as selected.

name: stack
description: If `true`, stack the quick filters vertically.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the quick filters.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the quick filters.
